item.title: About
item.description: Introduction This is my personal website. You can find personal information, but also information about my projects here. Python: DJone I have been building a webapp which basically replaces the work of a DJ by sorting different artist’s tracks by similarity. Github repository Python: digitalgovblockchain This app creates a plattform for polling securely. Github repository
